price: ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߊߥߎ߲ߠߌ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߥߍ߫ ߞߵߊߟߎ߫ ߡߌ߲߬ ߕߐߟߍ߯ ߞߊ߬ߡߊߛߐ߬ߘߐ߲߬ ߝߋ߲߫ ߝߍ߬ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߘߍ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
